    function SubmitSearchRedirect(strUrl, SearchParams) {
        var frm = document.forms["frmSiteSearch"];
        if (frm == null) {
            if (typeof (MSOWebPartPageFormName) != "undefined")
                frm = document.forms[MSOWebPartPageFormName];
        }
        if (frm != null) {
            var searchText = frm.elements["SearchString"].value;
            strUrl = strUrl + "?k=" + escapeProperly(searchText) + SearchParams;
            var searchScope = frm.elements["SearchScope"];
            if (searchScope != null) {
                var searchScopeUrl = searchScope.value;
                if (searchScopeUrl) {
                    strUrl = strUrl + "&u=" + escapeProperly(searchScopeUrl);
                }
            }           
            document.location.href = strUrl;           
        }
    }
    function SearchCustomKeyDown(event, strUrl, SearchParams) {
        if (IsKeyDownSubmit(event)) {
            SubmitSearchRedirect(strUrl, SearchParams);
            return false;
        }
        return true;
    }

</script>
